Description: An anthology of short fiction by the great Russian writer encompasses thirty of his finest tales, including "The Huntsman," "The Boring Story," "The Lady with the Little Dog," "Ward No. 6," "The Student," "The FiancTe," and "The Bishop," representing various periods in his creative work.
